sections.name: Subjective
sections.content: Client reported feeling anxious about upcoming work deadline. States sleep has been disrupted and appetite decreased. Reports using coping skills learned in previous sessions with some success.

sections.name: Objective
sections.content: Client appeared well-groomed with appropriate attire. Speech was normal rate and rhythm. Affect was anxious but congruent with reported mood. Eye contact was appropriate. No psychomotor agitation observed.

sections.name: Assessment
sections.content: Generalized Anxiety Disorder - mild improvement noted since last session. Client is engaging well in treatment and showing insight into anxiety patterns. Risk assessment: Low risk for self-harm.

sections.name: Plan
sections.content:
1. Continue weekly individual therapy sessions
2. Practice progressive muscle relaxation daily
3. Complete thought record worksheet before next session
4. Consider referral for medication evaluation if symptoms persist
